channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Lady Gaga Perform ‘Summerboy’ for First Time Since 2007 at Mayhem Ball
item.description: 🔥 Lady Gaga brought the summer vibes with her iconic performance of ‘Summerboy’ at Mayhem Ball! ☀️🎤 #LadyGaga #Summerboy #MayhemBall

item.title: Silica Gel – “NamgungFEFERE” (Feat. Japanese Breakfast)
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy collab we never knew we needed! Silica Gel teams up with Japanese Breakfast for a magical new track! ✨🎵 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: runo plum – “Lemon Garland”
item.description: 🍋🎶 Dive into the dreamy sounds of runo plum's latest track "Lemon Garland"! 🌼 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Kaytranada and Justice Announce Tour
item.description: 🎶 Let's dance the night away! Kaytranada and Justice are hitting the road on tour! Who's ready to groove? 💃🕺 #MusicNews #TourAnnouncement

item.title: L7 to Celebrate 40th Anniversary With Los Angeles Concert Featuring Lunachicks and CSS
item.description: 🎉 Rock legends L7 hit the stage for their 40th anniversary bash in LA! Join Lunachicks and CSS for a night of epic vibes! 🤘 #L7 #RockNRollLegends
